title: CGW request
author: VD
content_html: If anyone has a collection of old Computer Gaming World magazines from the early 1990s, I am looking for an article written by Mike Weksler about 3D hardware that referenced both Chris Taylor and Ime. It probably mentioned a chip called 3GA as well and would have run sometime between 1992 and 1995. Unfortunately, I’m not sure what issue it was except that it was after the first 100 issues that are archived online at the CGW Museum. If you can tell me the issue, or better yet, scan the article and send it to me, I would appreciate it.
content_text:
If anyone has a collection of old Computer Gaming World magazines from the early 1990s, I am looking for an article written by Mike Weksler about 3D hardware that referenced both Chris Taylor and
I
me.  It probably mentioned a chip called 3GA as well and would have run sometime between 1992 and 1995.  Unfortunately, I’m not sure what issue it was except that it was after the first 100 issues that are archived online at the CGW Museum.  If you can tell me the issue, or better yet, scan the article and send it to me, I would appreciate it.
